name: Save Haven
description:
Safe Haven

This was made as part of the OST Game Jam. Music credit goes to:

In this short Post-Cyberpunk Bullet Hell, Sinc has discovered that a Cyber Demon has taken control of her favorite bar. Her friend, the Bartender, Hasalt, has nearly lost his mind with fatigue from the horrors the Demon imposes on the place.

Sinc must do whatever they can to expunge the demon from this locale, so as to save their haven from the impending doom of the outside world...whatever is left of it.

Controls:
- WASD to move

- Space to dash

- Mouse click to shoot

Development and Visual Art by Thuleanx

Story and Audio by Dylan Davis
